description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Anyone can make music with 4-tet Music Maker. Game provides samples to start from or you can make create your own masterpiece from scratch. On screen help makes it easy to get started. Fun for kids of all ages. No musical skill or knowledge required.
